topSectionSubTitle: Easily sign a new electricity contract and terminate your old one here.
enterAddress: add information about your residence to see your price
tooBigResidenceSize: Unfortunately, we cannot calculate annual consumption for excessively large homes. Contact us to get your price!
popularText: Fortum has a heavily discounted offer for you, with no monthly fee for the entire first year. You can also  follow your electricity consumption easily with their smart app.
calculationsPopupFirstText: The prices quoted are calculated based on your expected electricity consumption. We have used what you have told us about your accommodation and used standard values for electricity consumption to calculate your electricity cost. The final cost can be higher or lower, depending on how much electricity you consume.
calculationsPopupThirdListItem: Number of people in the household
calculationsPopupSecondHeader: Why do you show two different costs?
calculationsPopupSecondText: Some providers offer an initial discount period. We show the estimated cost with and without this discount. Please note that the monthly cost will be higher when the discount period has expired.
consumptionChoiceText: Do you want to see monthly or yearly prices?

PROVIDERS.skekraftHeader: 100 % renewable electricity with award-winning customer service

CANCEL.onlyCancelText: Do you want to terminate your current electricity agreement, without signing a new one?
CANCEL.contactSupplier: Contact your current electricity network provider to terminate your electricity network agreement. When doing this, your electricity trading agreement will automatically be terminated and you are all done!
CANCEL.noSupplier: Don’t know your current electricity network provider? Check your latest invoice.
CANCEL.electricityProvider: Electricity provider at your current address: {{provider}}

skekraft.description: Skellefteå Kraft offers 100% renewable electricity from sun, wind and water. They are one of Sweden's largest producers of renewable energy and also have an award-winning customer service ready to help you. In their popular app you get full control of your consumption and smart services that make everyday life easier.
skekraft.discountPeriod: No monthly fee first {{months}} months (worth {{price}} kr)
skekraft.discount: {{discount}} öre/kWh in discount on electricity for the first {{months}} months.

vattenfall.description: Vattenfall sells electricity to approximately 1,000,000 customers in the Nordic region - to households and companies, to large and small consumers. They account for about half of Sweden's electricity production and are today the Nordic region's largest investor in wind power. Vattenfall invests in being number one for customers and the environment and the high service and competitive electricity prices makes it worth considering.
vattenfall.benefits4: Vattenfalls popular fossil free mix for free
vattenfall.discountPeriod: Discount on monthly fee if consumption is over 5 000 kWh
vattenfall.discount: {{discount}} öre/kWh  in discount on electricity price first {{months}} months.

fortum.description: Fortum is the largest electricity trading company in the Nordic region with a clear mission: to make it easy to choose safe and sustainable electricity. We combine high delivery reliability with competitive terms and one of the market's lowest mark-ups. All electricity we supply is 100% fossil-free as standard. With personal customer service and smart digital tools, we ensure easy handling, full transparency and control over your electricity consumption.
fortum.discount: No monthly fee for the first {{months}} månaderna.

tibber.description: The future of electricity is about using it smarter. With Tibber, this means helping you shift your electricity consumption to times when power is cheap and the grid is rich in fossil-free energy. Thanks to Tibber’s smart technology, you no longer need to monitor prices or schedule charging — Tibber does it for you. Your electricity is directed to where it’s most beneficial — automatically and effortlessly. The journey to the lowest possible price for you and your home starts with Tibber.
tibber.benefits1: Shift your consumption to cheaper hours
tibber.benefits2: Get paid for supporting the power grid

PROVIDERDETAILS.priceComparisonText: Based on the electricity price in {{month}}. Network fee is not included.

STEPONE.questions: Questions? We are happy to help in the chat.
STEPONE.fixesTextSectionOne: To get access to electricity in your new home, you need to sign two different agreements:
STEPONE.fixesListItemOne: An electricity network agreement, to transport electricity to your home
STEPONE.fixesListItemTwo: An electricity trading agreement, for your electricity consumption
STEPONE.fixesTextSectionTwo: Also, do not forget to cancel your current agreements.

STEPTWO.fixesListItemOne: In the next step you sign the agreements you need, easily and securely.
STEPTWO.fixesListItemTwo: You get to choose between several electricity trading agreements. We have hand-picked alternatives available at your new address and negotiated the price.
STEPTWO.fixesListItemThree: You will also sign an electricity network agreement. This agreement is always signed with the provider who owns the electricity network in your new area.
STEPTWO.fixesListItemFour: You can also cancel the agreements you no longer need, all in one place.
STEPTWO.addInfoToSeePrice: fill in the information about your home to see your price
STEPTWO.cancelOldContractDate: Pick the date you want the contract to terminate on
STEPTWO.cancelOldContractDateText: Cancel my current electricity contract for me
STEPTWO.cancelOldContractHelperBoxText: Note that we can only help you with the termination if it is you personally who is on the electricity contract.

STEP3DETAILS.startingText: When should the electricity be turned on?
STEP3DETAILS.apartmentNumber: What’s the apartment number of your new residence?
STEP3DETAILS.facilityIdText: What’s the facilityID of your new residence?
STEP3DETAILS.facilityIDWarningMessage: Pick a later start date, if you want to continue without entering facilityID.
STEP3DETAILS.cancelSubtitle: Please note that we only can cancel agreements that are signed by you personally.
STEP3DETAILS.datePopupText: You can pick a date within 7 days, if you know the facilityID of your new residence.
STEP3DETAILS.facilityIdPopupText: Don’t know the facilityID of your new residence? Ask the person living there now to check the invoice for the electricity network.
STEP3DETAILS.facilityIdWarningText: Pick a later start date, if you want to continue without entering facilityID.
STEP3DETAILS.aptNumberModalText1: An apartment number consists of four digits and is used by the Tax Agency to identify apartments.
STEP3DETAILS.aptNumberModalText2: The first two numbers indicate the floor. Entrance level is set to 10 and floors above are numbered 11, 12, etc. Floor plan below the entrance is set to 09, 08, etc.
STEP3DETAILS.aptNumberModalText3: The last two numbers indicate the position of the home on the floor. The residence directly to the left of the stairs, when approaching the floor level from below, is set to 01. Numbering then continues clockwise.
STEP3DETAILS.aptNumberError: he apartment number must be 4 digits

STEP4SUMMARY.name: Name
STEP4SUMMARY.poaText: I give {{provider}} and Flyttsmart <0>power of attorney</0> to order a new agreement at my new address and if necessary contact the network owner and ask them to cancel my current electricity network agreement.
STEP4SUMMARY.tibberPoaText: I agree to <1>{{provider}}'s general terms and conditions</1> and that a customary credit check will take place, and give Flyttsmart <0>power of attorney</0> to sign a new agreement at the specified address.
STEP4SUMMARY.poaTextFortum: I agree to <1>{{provider}}'s general terms and conditions</1> and give Flyttsmart <0>power of attorney</0> to sign a new agreement at the specified address.
STEP4SUMMARY.poaPopupBoldText: I hereby authorize “Power of Attorney”, {{provider}} and Flyttsmart Sverige AB “Power of Attorney” on my behalf:
STEP4SUMMARY.popListItem1: Obtain facility information that is registered on my social security number, terminate any current electricity network agreements and sign electricity network agreements for the address I have stated that I will move to.
STEP4SUMMARY.popListItem2: Receive facility ID information for the new address.
STEP4SUMMARY.popListItem3: Obtain information from my current electricity trading company about the first possible start date for a new electricity agreement and terminate my existing agreement and sign a new electricity trading agreement.
STEP4SUMMARY.popListItem4: The Power of Attorney is valid from the time I press the 'Go on' button and is valid for 12 months thereafter.
STEP4SUMMARY.acceptenceTextLink2: general terms and conditions of the industry (Swedish)
STEP4SUMMARY.disclaimerText: The agreement is signed directly with  {{provider}} and is valid until further notice. You always have a

CONFIRMATIONPAGE.title: Congratulations on a
CONFIRMATIONPAGE.confirmationText: We have recieved your order for electricity agreement with  {{provider}}.
CONFIRMATIONPAGE.confirmationSubtitle: You will receive an email confirmation shortly with information about what happens next.

MOVESUMMARY.question1: Is electricity included in my rent/monthly fee?
MOVESUMMARY.answer1: Electricity is usually not included in the rent/monthly fee. However, it is becoming more common for housing associations and owners of multi-family buildings to sign a joint electricity contract. It is usually a little cheaper for you as a user.
MOVESUMMARY.answer1_text2: Unfortunately, we do not know what applies in your particular residence. Ask your property owner or condominium association for a sure answer to this question.
MOVESUMMARY.question2: How do I cancel my current electricity contract?
MOVESUMMARY.answer2: When you sign a new electricity contract at Flyttsmart, you can take the opportunity to terminate your current one. Just tick the 'Cancel current electricity contract' box and specify the date the electricity should be turned off, and we'll take care of the rest.
MOVESUMMARY.answer2_text2: Please note that we can only cancel contracts signed by you personally.
MOVESUMMARY.question3: Which electricity contracts do I need to sign for my new home?
MOVESUMMARY.answer3: To get access to electricity in your new home, you need to sign two different agreements:
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem1: Electricity network agreement, so that the electricity reaches the home
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem2: Electricity trading agreement, for your ongoing electricity consumption
MOVESUMMARY.answer3_text2: When you fix the electricity at Flyttsmart, you can choose between several proposals for electricity trade agreements. We have selected the best options at your new address and pushed the prices down.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3_text3: At the same time, you sign an electricity network agreement with the supplier that owns the electricity network in your new residential area. Here, in other words, you cannot choose between different suppliers. You don't need to contact the supplier – we'll take care of it for you.

EXTERNAL.calculatePriceText: Calculate your expected electricity consumption and cost
EXTERNAL.closingTestament: Your final monthly cost will be calculated on your actual electricity consumption. Electricity costs are added.
EXTERNAL.whichZipCode: Which postcode are you moving to?
